sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"保证"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: ensure, insure, assure, guarantee, pledge, promise
means: ensure ： 侧重使人相信某个行为或力量产生的结果。
insure常与ensure换用，但前者多指经济方面的保证、保险。
assure ： 侧重指消除某人思想上的怀疑或担心，从而有达到目的的保证感，但不如ensure普通。
guarantee ： 指对事物的品质或人的行为及履行义务、义务等承担责任的保证。
pledge ： 正式用词，指通过郑重许诺、协议或立誓等保证承担某一义务或遵守某一原则。
promise ： 侧重表自己的主观意向，设法用语言使人感到稳当可靠。

sentence.Network_en: "One thing you can never insure against is corruption among your staff."—"Agreed."
sentence.Network_cn: “永远也防不胜防的就是员工内部的贪污腐败。”——“同意。”

sentence.Network_en: Think carefully before you insure against accident, sickness and redundancy.
sentence.Network_cn: 在为意外事故、疾病与失业投保之前一定要考虑清楚。

sentence.Network_en: Will it insure success to [ for ] you?
sentence.Network_cn: 这将保证你成功 吗 ?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... assuredly ad 无疑地 insure v 保险；保证 tactual a 触觉的.
新浪教育_新浪网 ... ) whistle 口哨声; )insure 给……保险,确保; )guarantee 保证,确保.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... insurance n. 保险 insure vt. 给……保险 intend vt. 想要，打算.
保险行业英语 - 圈中人保险网 ... 指定风险保险( Named peril policy) insure 保险；投保；保证 insurance company 保险公司.

list.abs: 法律英语专业词汇汇总 ... 保险合同 insurance contract 保险人 insurer;underwriter 被保险人 the insured.
3 - 佐欧伊的日志 - 网易博客 ... *insurance transactions 保险业务 *insurer 保险人；承保人 *integrated circuits 集成电路.
商城首页 - Imal2u 网上商城 ... 收藏 Collection 保险 Insurance 汽车 Automobile.
会计英语翻译_百度知道 ... Franchise Fees（ 专营权费） Insurance（ 保险费） Ocean Delivery In Expense（ 远洋运输费）.
所谓被保险人（insured），指于保险事故发生时，遭受损害，享有赔偿请求权之人；要保人亦得为被保险人。
受字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 受训〖 receive(orundergo)training〗 受保人〖 insurant;insured〗 受潮〖 beaffectedwithdamp〗.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'assure someone of something'): alteration of ensure

entry.def: If you insure yourself or your property, you pay money to an insurance company so that, if you become ill or if your property is damaged or stolen, the company will pay you a sum of money.

example.ex: For protection against unforeseen emergencies, you insure your house, your furnishings and your car...
example.tran: 为了防范不可预见的紧急情况,人们给房子、家具和汽车上保险。

example.ex: Think carefully before you insure against accident, sickness and redundancy...
example.tran: 在为意外事故、疾病与失业投保之前一定要考虑清楚。

entry.def: If you insure yourself against something unpleasant that might happen in the future, you do something to protect yourself in case it happens, or to prevent it happening.

example.ex: He insured himself against failure by treating only people he was sure he could cure...
example.tran: 他仅仅治疗有把握治愈的病人，以使自己免于失败。

example.ex: All the electronics in the world cannot insure against accidents, though.
example.tran: 世上没有哪种电子器材能完全避免意外事故的发生。

means.word_mean: 1. be careful or certain to do something; make certain of something;

sentences.sentence: "He verified that the valves were closed"
"This nest egg will ensure a nice retirement for us"

auth_sentence.content: Currin's methods insure that he works slowly.
auth_sentence.res_content: Currin's methods insure that he works slowly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Currin's methods insure that he works slowly.

auth_sentence.content: The agricultural policies of India's government insure the opposite.
auth_sentence.res_content: The agricultural policies of India's government insure the opposite.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The agricultural policies of India's government insure the opposite.

auth_sentence.content: I insure you he is a king most vile and pernicious.
auth_sentence.res_content: I insure you he is a king most vile and pernicious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I insure you he is a king most vile and pernicious.

stems_affixes.word_buile: assure[v.肯定;确保]+ed……的→adj.确实的, 确定的
sure肯定,确定→adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确
assured[adj.确实的, 确定的]+ly表副词→adv.确实地;确信地
sure肯定,确定→adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确
insure[v.保险,给…保险;保证]+ance表名词→n.保险,保险费,保险业

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证,担保;确信,断言;信心,信念
stems_affixes.word_buile: assure[v.肯定;确保]+ance表名词→n.保证,担保;确信,断言;信心,信念

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证人, 担保, 保证
stems_affixes.word_buile: sure肯定,确定+ty表名词→n.保证人, 担保, 保证
as一再+sure确定→一再确定→肯定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证, 担保, 使安全, 保证得到
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……+sure[adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确]→v.保证, 担保, 使安全, 保证得到 v.确保, 确保, 保证
in使……+sure肯定,确定→v.保险,给…保险;保证
re再次+assure确信→v.消除某人疑虑

sentences.en: Check your work to insure its accuracy.
sentences.cn: 检查一下你的工作, 以保证它的准确性。

sentences.en: Will it insure success to[for] you?
An insurance company will insure your life.
sentences.cn: 保险公司可以给你保寿险。

jushi.english: They insure public or private property.
Careful planning and hard work insured our success.
jushi.chinese: 细心筹划及努力工作保证了我们的成功。

jushi.english: An insurance company will insure your life.
jushi.chinese: 保险公司可以给你保寿险。
